description: This file defines React components for rendering styled HTML table elements, including Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableFooter, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, and TableCaption, with support for forwarding refs and custom class names.

methods.name: Table
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableHeader
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table header section with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableBody
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table body section with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableFooter
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table footer section with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableRow
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table row with hover and selection styles, with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableHead
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table header cell with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableCell
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table data cell with forwarded ref.

methods.name: TableCaption
methods.description: React component for rendering a styled table caption with forwarded ref.
